Name: Polycab Flexible Cords Type SJT/HO3VV-F UL 62 300V AC
Key_Features: Heat resistant, Oil Resistance, Moisture resistant
Short_Description: Flexible copper conductor with PVC insulated and PVC jacketed cable
Full_Description: POLYCAB Type SJT/H03VV-F, PVC insulated, PVC Jacketed flexible cable are suitable to use for home appliances viz: vacuum cleaners, refrigerators, washing machine and small appliances where mechanical stress is low. These cables are suitable to use in wet and damp areas.

Name: Polycab Festoon Flat 0.5Sq.mm Multicore Product
Key_Features: High Mechanical Strength, Glossy finish, Highly reliable, Very high flexibility
Short_Description: Annealed plain flexible copper conductor, Thermoplastic PVC Insulated,Thermoplastic PVC Sheathed 1100V flat cable
Full_Description: POLYCAB Festoon Multicore Flat Flexible Cables are used in Hoists, Cranes and Lifts to carry the signals for all the controls required for the sophisticated Lift applications and Cranes/Hoist operations.

Name: Polycab SiR-G 1100V AC IS 9968-1
Key_Features: Heat resistant, Highly Flexible, Long life
Short_Description: Single or Multicore cable, flexible copper conductor, silicon insulated, glass fiber braided
Full_Description: 1100 V Single or Multicore cable, flexible copper conductor, silicon insulated, glass fiber braided, are designed to use in flexible wiring, single phase or three phase (earthed or unearthed) system for rated voltage up to and including 1100 V. These cables may be used on DC system for rated voltage grade 1500 V to earth. These cables are suitable to use for heater leads, electric iron leads, furnace and high temperature area.

Name: Polycab Classic 110 Black 600/1000V AC
Key_Features: Sunlight resistance, Ozone Resistant, Heat resistant, Flame retardant
Short_Description: Annealed bare flexible conductor, PVC insulated, PVC sheathed 1000V cable
Full_Description: POLYFLEX CLASSIC 110 BLACK, 600/1000V fine wire flexible copper conductor, PVC insulated, with oil resistant PVC outer sheath is designed to use in plant engineering, industrial machinery, heating & air conditioning system, power station. It is suitable to use for torsional application in wind turbine and for power chain drive.
